info.title: SeminarDesk Private API (unreleased next version)
info.description:
Provides access to these resources: events, dates, profiles, bookings, invoices and certificates.

**Note**: This is the upcoming version which is not yet released.

tenantId.description: Unique tenant ID assigned to each customer by SeminarDesk

get.summary: Retrieves a list of events

401.description: API key is missing or invalid

403.description: API key does not have required permissions

501.description: Request cannot be handled, private API not active or required module not enabled

201.description: Created, contains the newly created event

post.summary: Creates a new booking for all dates of this event that have a status which allows bookings
post.description: Note: This could result in either *one* or *multiple bookings* being created based on the event's "booking mode" setting.

parameters.name: ignoreExistingBookings
parameters.description: If this is set to `true`, then existing bookings for any of the provided dates/guests will be ignored â€“ otherwise this would result in a 400 error

201.description: Created, contains the newly created booking(s)

post.summary: Adds a payment to an invoice
post.description: Note: In the background, payments will be added to the related source (e.g. a booking) instead of the invoice directly. So this method can only be used for invoices with one single source.

201.description: OK, contains the newly created payment

400.description: Request cannot be completed due to invalid input or because the item's state does not permit a certain change

401.description: API key is missing or invalid

officialTitle.description: Title or code as given by the provider

defaultValidityInMonths.description: If present, indicates the number of months a certificate will be valid after issuing

takeoverSource.description: Determines whether the takeover period should only consider certificates of the same type (ONLY_SAME_TYPE) or also the certificates from the requirements (REQUIREMENTS)

requirementsAggregation.description: Determines whether all or only at least one of the requirements must be fulfilled

usedTakeover.description: Number of days that were "taken over" from a required certificate or null

manualPrice.description: In case misc item has "manual" mode of calculation, the price must be specified

quantity.description: This is only allowed in the case of a item of type "misc"

remarks.description: Optional "cancelation remarks" that will be saved alongside the canceled invoice

amount.description: The amount can be a negative or positive number

begin.description: If not provided, will default to begin of booking guest

end.description: If not provided, will default to end of booking guest

priceListItemId.description: Contains the ID of the price list item related to this item, if any

quantity.description: This is only considered for items of type "misc"

code.description: Unique code of this payment method

facilitators.description: When a value is provided, this will override the existing list of facilitators.

pendingParticipantGuests.description: Number of pending guests of type "participant"

confirmedParticipantGuests.description: Number of confirmed guests of type "participant"

availableSpots.description: Number of bookable spots, based on the "max. part" or *null* in case this is not set

isPublished.description: If "true", then this document will be made available for all confirmed participants with booking page account

name.description: Unique name or number of the room

code.description: Unique code for the room type

name.description: Name of this salutation as given in the administration

effectiveInvoiceEmail.description: The email address that should be used to send invoices to

localizedName.description: Localized country name, depending on the system's locale

isFacilitator.description: When this is set to `true`, this person profile will be converted to a facilitator profile.

dueDate.description: The invoice's due date, could also be `null`

periodOfService.description: The invoice's period of service, based upon all invoice items' periods of service

recipientName.description: The recipient's name copied during invoice posting

billingAddress.description: The recipient's billing address (structured) copied during invoice posting

billingAddressFormatted.description: The recipient's billing address (formatted) copied during invoice posting

status.description: The HTTP status code associated with the problem

code.description: An optional error code representing the type of problem

additionalField.description: Filter by additional field, based on its ID

externalReferenceId.description: Filter by an external ID in the format `<ID of external system>:<System ID>`

event.additionalField.description: Filter by *event's* additional field designated by the given ID

externalReferenceId.description: Filter by an external system ID in the format `<ID of external system>:<System ID>`

additionalField.description: Filter by value of additional field designated by the given ID

externalReferenceId.description: Filter by an external system ID in the format `<ID of external system>:<System ID>`
Filter by an external system ID in the format `<ID of external system>:<System ID>`
Filter by an external system ID in the format `<ID of external system>:<System ID>`

Certificate_takeoverSourceCertificate.description: In case there was a "takeover" from a required certificate, this will be the reference to this very certificate

BookingGuest_guest.description: Either a profile OR name plus optionally age and gender

EventProperties_publishingSettings.description: At the moment, contains just base information from the "booking page settings". Might be extended in the future.

title.example: My Booking Page Sample Event Date Name

numberOfDays.description: Number of days after inactive profiles should be deleted. 0 indicates immediate delete, -1 indicates no deletion

letterSalutation.description: The letter salutation is used in the address section of a letter naming the recipient of the letter

InvoiceProperties_originalInvoice.description: In case of a cancelation invoice, this will contain a reference to the "original invoice"

UnauthorizedError.description: API key is missing or invalid

ForbiddenError.description: API key does not have required permissions

BadRequestError.description: Request cannot be completed due to invalid input or because the item's state does not permit a certain change

ConflictError.description: Request cannot be completed due to a conflict

NotImplementedError.description: Request cannot be handled, private API not active or required module not enabled

FieldId.name: fieldId
FieldId.description: Numeric ID of the additional field

ApiKeyAuth.description: API key generated in SeminarDesk backend
ApiKeyAuth.name: X-API-Key
